title: Well outraged Fiora players , you got what you wanted
body: Although i liked the new splash as it was , Heres the updated Fiora splash/model currently on the pbe ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

replies.body:
I don't even play Fiora. I just hate when Riot pulls a dick move like that.

Plus the most enraging thing about this hole situation, for me, was how Ironstylus said "it's too much work to change her in-game hair now" and then started speaking out of his ass about UV map MAYBE getting screwed in the process.

About a goddamn texture they already changed 3 times by then!

It's funny how something so difficult to change as her hair was so quickly changed right?

IronStylus has a severe disability in public relations.  Anyways, here's hoping they take a similar approach to I've seen some shit Fiora, Grandma's Curtains Fiora, and Blow Up Fiora edition.
Not to be rude, but if you've seen pics of him... He looks like he'd be very awkward in social situations, especially in groups.

Preface: This post is just casual conversation. 

Groups and real life are one thing but we're talking about properly articulating a thought onto a message board or forum without sounding like a dick in the process.  A thought where should you choose to, you could take several hours to get right.  You and I aren't going to do that but when you're speaking to upset customers, it might benefit someone in IronStylus's position to reread his posts before he's certain that's exactly what he wants to say.  This all goes back to that "lack of communication" jargon they like to throw around.

This isn't one of the parrot's tools in his skill set.

well isn't that what it should be ? sure we have some "sexy' champions that you want to play because of that but not every champ has to be some sort or seduction goddess. Im talking in terms of the splash , the design of the outfit is sleek and looks nice , the colors mesh well and while very stylized ( what people are calling angular and cartoony) is a very defined and polished aesthetic. Of course style is subjective and people will love and hate it as we've seen. Pushing a champion through theme is much more interesting than making them sexy giving them a weapon and saying "here she's a duelist".

You mean that you actually want Eve to look like a stripper...
She looks so untasty that it would be a blessing for everyone if she got a VU and was given a more fitting attire.

Female champions should represent themselves in other ways than pretty face and big guns. Fiora's new splash being a good example. She has more personality and less sex appeal.

Ahri's new splash was originally good and then the communtily demanded that the face would be made more oriental and now she looks like an obaa-san (granny). The only champion that is supposed to be the epitome of beauty.

I seriously believe that Riot is listening to the vocal minority too much and ignores the fact that most people that are actually fine with the changes are not coming to the boards to say "Good job Riot".
I for one actually like changes they made to Ahri's splash, since before she barely looked like Ahri or "just as every fit female in clothes like that" even.

In the end it doesn't really matter. I'm fine with what Riot is doing with **their** splash art. I'm just irritated cause the community is being so noisy and rude when it comes to graphical assests. Feedback is ok but some people just don't know when to stop.

We can expect a huge commotion when Eve gets a VU eventually cause I doubt Riot will keep her stripper looks. And when the community demands that she should remain as a stripper... I REALLY hope Riot will draw the line there (traditional skin would be ok tho).

Again, last time I heard Ironstylus speaking about Eve, he said she will keep most if not all of her seductress look.

Unless he was just dicking us like he did with the "we won't change Fiora's hair cuz tech" LeReddit post.
